testcase.name: Verify valid login
testcase.system-out: Given I am at Buggy login page..............................................passed When I login Buggy with user: "test.user" and password: "Password1!"........passed Then I should reach to user dashboard.......................................passed And I should see the relevant user first name: "Ricky"......................passed

testcase.name: Verify logout
testcase.system-out: Given I am at Buggy login page..............................................passed When I login Buggy with user: "test.user" and password: "Password1!"........passed Then I should reach to user dashboard.......................................passed And I should see the relevant user first name: "Ricky"......................passed When I click on Logout......................................................passed Then I should logged out successfully.......................................passed

testcase.name: Verify invalid login - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am at Buggy login page..............................................passed When I login Buggy with user: "invaliduser" and password: "invalidpassword".passed Then I should see error message: "Invalid username/password"................passed And I am still on Home page.................................................passed

testcase.name: Verify valid registration - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am at Buggy register page...........................................passed When I register with valid data.............................................passed Then I should see the notification message: "Registration is successful"....passed When I login with registered user...........................................passed And I should see the relevant user first name: "John".......................passed And I should see the valid user info under user profile page................passed

testcase.name: Verify registration with existing user - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am at Buggy register page...........................................passed When I try to register with existing user...................................passed Then I should see the error message: "User already exists"..................passed
